head.title: Convertible Debt Offerings for This Week

hedline.hl1: Convertible Debt Offerings for This Week

block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Andrx Corp., Fort Lauderdale, Fla., 7.4 million shares. BancAmerica Securities and Bear, Stearns & Co.
Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria S.A., Bilbao, Spain, 50.1 million American Depositary Shares, each share represents 1 ordinary share. Schroder & Co.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Andrx Corp., Fort Lauderdale, Fla., 7.4 million shares. BancAmerica Securities and Bear, Stearns & Co.
Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria S.A., Bilbao, Spain, 50.1 million American Depositary Shares, each share represents 1 ordinary share. Schroder & Co.
BTU International Inc., North Billerica, Mass., 2.7 million shares. Needham & Co.
Centillium Communications Inc., Fremont, Calif., an initial public offering of 4 million shares. CS First Boston.
Core Laboratories N.V., Amsterdam, 4.6 million shares. CS First Boston and Salomon Smith Barney.
First Horizon Pharmaceutical Corp., Roswell, Ga., an initial public offering of 3.8 million shares. Chase Bank Hambrecht & Quist.
Integrated Circuit Systems Inc., Norristown, Pa., an initial public offering of 12.5 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston.
Kensey Nash Corp., Exton, Pa., an initial public offering of 3.2 million shares. Prudential Securities.
Microwemi Corp., Santa Ana, Calif., 2.2 million shares. A.G. Edwards & Sons.
Molecular Devices Corp., Sunnyvale, Calif., 1.6 million shares. ING Barings.
Nelvana Ltd., Toronto, an initial public offering of 3.8 million subordinated voting shares. Bear, Stearns & Co.
NRG Energy Inc., Minneapolis, an initial public offering shares of 28.2 million shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
ONI Systems Corp., San Jose, Calif., an initial public offering of 8 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Sonus Networks Inc., Westford, Mass., an initial public offering of 5 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Stanford Microdevices Inc., Sunnyvale, Calif., an initial public offering of 4 million shares. Deutche Bank Alex. Brown.
Three-Five Systems Inc., Tempe, Ariz., 2.6 million shares. BancAmerica Securities and Needham & Co.
Universal Compression Holdings Inc., Houston, an initial public offering of 7 million shares, 5.6 million in the U.S. and Canada. Merrill Lynch & Co.
Urban Cool Network Inc., Dallas, an initial public offering of 2 million shares. Kashner Davidson Securities Corp.
(Source: MCM EquityWatch.)
